articles.title: Microsoft may have pulled a planned launch of a new Windows 11 Dev Channel Insider build - Neowin
articles.description: Online reports indicate Microsoft uploaded ISO files for a new Windows 11 Dev Channel Build 23526 for Insiders to download, but that those files were quickly pulled from circulation.
articles.content:
Microsoft looks like it had planned to release a new Windows 11 build for members of its Insider program today. However, it looks like something happened to cause Microsoft to delay the release.
Not… [+1403 chars]

articles.description: Immortals of Aveum will debut a new feature for PC graphics, allowing you to see how each setting will impact your performance in real time.
